description: Canonical CET baseline distributions used for drift detection. Contains a label PMF over primary CET assignments and a histogram PMF of primary scores (0-100 in 10-point bins).

source.notes: This baseline was promoted automatically from the candidate baseline distributions. Review and adjust thresholds as needed based on historical runs.

notes: Keep this file under version control so CI and drift detection use a stable baseline.
If you need to update the baseline, run the promotion workflow or replace this file via the promote script with --force.
